eu.amidst.core.models

Class BayesianNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.core.models.BayesianNetwork
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class BayesianNetwork
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The BayesianNetwork class represents a Bayesian network model.
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • classNameID

        public static java.lang.String classNameID()

      • equalBNs

        public boolean equalBNs(BayesianNetwork bnet,
                        double threshold)
        Tests if two Bayesian networks are equals. A two Bayesian networks are considered equals if they have an equal conditional distribution for each variable.
        Parameters:
        bnet - a given BayesianNetwork to be compared with this BayesianNetwork.
        threshold - a threshold value.
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating if the two BNs are equals or not.

      • getConditionalDistribution

        public <E extends ConditionalDistribution> E getConditionalDistribution(Variable var)
        Returns the conditional probability distribution of a variable.
        Parameters:
        var - a variable of type Variable.
        Returns:
        a conditional probability distribution.

        public java.util.List<ConditionalDistribution> getConditionalDistributions()

        Returns:
        a list of ConditionalDistribution.

                                                 java.util.List<ConditionalDistribution> dists)
        Creates a new BayesianNetwork from a dag and a list of distributions.
